MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD1 postcode area of Galashiels, affecting properties in Huddersfield street and surrounding areas. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 4:45pm due to an underground cable being damaged by a 3rd party and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:20pm on Monday, 16 November 2020
